author: Monty M
title: Very expensive, but very classy and cool
text:
I had a speaking engagement during a dinner at the hotel, so my room was paid for; normally Â£400+ for a night is too much for me.
Saying that, it was a very cool experience. Some personal touches in the room (never underestimate free chocolates), the bed was divine and all connectivity fast.
The spa is nearly as awesome as the bar, which contains the beautiful people, but dress to impress if you don't want to look out of place.
Outside Soho bars are two minutes and theatres even less. Definitely one for a romantic London out, which will probably break the bank, but all the better for that.
